pages.about_cookies_rum_em_0205: Cookies on the site: how they work. Cookies perform several functions that help optimize the user experience and improve the usability of websites. Home ABOUT US HOW TO PLAY FAQ'S Users Say DOWNLOAD APP Cookies on the site: how they work Cookies (from the English “cookie”, originally “magic cookie”) in the context of the Internet are small text files that a website stores on the user’s device, for example, a computer or mobile device. Cookies are created and sent to the user's device through the browser when the user visits a particular website. Cookies perform several functions that help optimize the user experience and improve the usability of websites. They can be used to remember user preferences and settings, save session information or browsing history. One of the main functions of cookies is user identification. When a user logs into a website, the server creates a unique session ID and stores it in a cookie on the user's device. This ID allows the server to track the user's actions on the website and provide more personalized content. Cookies may also be used to analyze user behavior and collect statistical data. For example, they can track the number of visits to a website, time spent on pages, and user preferences. This data may be anonymous and used to improve the website and tailor it to user needs. Cookies can be either permanent or temporary. Persistent cookies remain on the user's device for a specified period of time and are activated each time the user visits a particular website.Temporary cookies only last for the duration of the user's session and are deleted when the browser is closed. It is important to note that cookies are not harmful to the user's computer and cannot contain viruses or malicious code. They can only be used to read the information that the website provides to them. However, some users may be concerned about the privacy aspects of using cookies. Therefore, most modern browsers offer the ability to control the use of cookies. Users can choose whether they want to allow cookies to be stored and used, and can also delete or block cookies that have already been stored. Overall, cookies play an important role in the functioning of websites and provide a more personalized and convenient user experience. However, it is important to adhere to the principles of privacy and transparency in the use of cookies so that users feel protected and have control over their online activities. Download RummyEmpire basic rules for Rummy game Here is a summary of the most important ones: 🔥 The deck consists of 52 cards plus two jokers. Each player is dealt 13 cards. The remaining cards form the stock. 🔥 The goal of the game is to put all your cards into valid combinations. When all your cards are in valid combinations, you declare rummy and show up. 🔥 Moves are made one by one. On your turn, you draw a card from the stock or from the discard pile, then discard one card. 🔥 Joker can be used to replace any card in combinations. You can make combinations from cards in your hand, from the table or by combining them. 🔥 The points of the opponents' remaining cards are counted. The winner is the one who first scores the required number of points. card combinations There are 4 main types of valid card combinations in the Rummy game: Pure Sequence This is a sequence of at least 3 cards of the same suit, ranked by seniority/rank. For example: 4♥️, 5♥️, 6♥️ or 9♦️, 10♦️, J♦️, Q♦️. Pure Set A group of at least 3 cards of the same value (rank), but of different suits. For example: 7♥️, 7♦️, 7♣️ or K♠️, K♦️, K♥️, K♣️. Impure Sequence A sequence of at least 3 cards of different suits, ranked by rank. For example: 5♠️, 6♦️, 7♥️ or J♣️, Q♦️, K♥️. Impure Set A group of at least 3 cards of the same value, but of different suits. For example: 9♥️, 9♦️, Joker or K♥️, K♦️, Joker. Recommendations and tips Here are some useful tips for playing rummy successfully: Strive for clean combinations Pure combinations (pure sets and sequences of the same suit) are more valuable and provide an advantage. Try to collect them in priority order. Use jokers wisely Jokers are a valuable resource. Use them to complete combinations when other options are exhausted. Plan your resets Discard the cards that are least needed for your combinations. Make sure that your opponents do not select cards that are advantageous to them. Monitor your inventory Always keep in mind how many cards are left in stock. With a small number of cards, the probability of getting the right one decreases. Consider precipitation In some variants of the game, cards remaining in the hands of opponents are awarded penalty points. Questions and answers for "RummyEmpire" app Enjoy the game, and may the cards be in your favor! How to start a game in the "RummyEmpire" app? To start playing the "RummyEmpire" app you need to download and install the application on your device. Then, once launched, you must create an account or log into an existing one. After that, you can select the game mode and start playing. Is it possible to play "RummyEmpire" app with friends? Yes, you can play "RummyEmpire" app with your friends. The application offers the opportunity to play with real opponents online, as well as the ability to invite your friends to the game and compete with them. Is it possible to play the "RummyEmpire" app without an Internet connection? Yes, you can play "RummyEmpire" app without internet connection. The application offers the possibility of playing in offline mode, where you can play with computer opponents or with friends nearby. What bonuses and rewards does the RummyEmpire app offer? In the "RummyEmpire" app you can receive various bonuses and rewards for achievements and progress in the game. For example, you can receive bonus coins that can be used to purchase additional features or improve your gaming experience. How is data security ensured in the "RummyEmpire" app? The "RummyEmpire" app provides a high level of data security. All transmitted and stored information is encrypted, and the application strictly adheres to the privacy policy and protection of user data. Is it possible to exchange coins in the "RummyEmpire" app for real money? Yes, in the "RummyEmpire" app it is possible to exchange coins for real money. How to earn more coins in "RummyEmpire" app? There are several ways to earn more coins in the "RummyEmpire" app. You can win games and receive prize coins, complete daily tasks and achievements, and take part in special promotions and competitions. How to contact "RummyEmpire" app support? If you have any questions or problems using the "RummyEmpire" app, you can contact support. To do this, a feedback function is available in the application, where you can leave your problem or question, and you will be provided with assistance from specialists. This privacy policy explains what information we collect about you when you use our website and how we use and protect that information. 1. Information collected: We may collect the following information about you when you use our website: - Name and contact information, including email address. - Information about your account and profile on our website. - Information you provide when you contact us or fill out forms on our website. - Information about your use of our website, including IP address, geographic location, browser type, length of visit and pages viewed. 2. Use of information: We use the collected information for the following purposes: - Providing you with access to and use of our website and its functions. - Providing a personalized experience on our website. - Processing your requests, comments and feedback. - Providing you with information about our products, services and promotions if you agree to receive such notifications. - Improving the quality of our website, its functionality and security. - Preventing fraud and illegal activities. 3. Information protection: We take security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, use or disclosure. We have appropriate physical, electronic and managerial procedures in place to safeguard this information. 4. Transfer of information to third parties: We may share information about you with third parties as necessary to fulfill our service obligations or as required by law. 5. Links to third party websites: Our website may contain links to third party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or the content of these websites. We recommend that you review the privacy policies of these third-party websites before providing them with information about yourself. 6. Changes to the privacy policy: We reserve the right to make changes to our privacy policy. Any changes will be posted on this page and will be effective upon posting. We recommend that you check this page regularly to review the current privacy policy. If you have any questions or require further information, please contact us through the contact details provided on the website.
